title: Calamity Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Calamity Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 154
items.arabic: ((إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي، وَأَخْلِفْ لِي خَيْرَاً مِنْهَا)).
items.transliteration: Inna lillahi wa-inna ilayhi rajiAAoon, allahumma/- jurnee fee museebatee wakhluf lee khayran minha.
items.translation: To Allah we belong and unto Him is our return.O Allah, recompense me for my affliction and replace it for me with something better.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء المصيبة
